mapper.delete: DELETE m FROM k3_tb_member AS m WHERE memberId = #{memberId};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM k3_tb_member AS m WHERE m.memberId = #{memberId};

SELECT m.memberId AS memberId ,m.memberPassword AS memberPassword ,m.mainBusinessCode AS mainBusinessCode ,m.levelMemberCode AS levelMemberCode ,m.memberName AS memberName ,m.memberGender AS memberGender ,m.memberAddr AS memberAddr ,m.memberPhone AS memberPhone ,m.memberResidentRegistrationNumber AS memberResidentRegistrationNumber ,m.memberState AS memberState ,m.memberRegDate AS memberRegDate ,m.memberHiredDate AS memberHiredDate FROM k3_tb_member AS m
